Poetic Translation: You are sanctified, among all women blest,

Direct Translation: and blessed is the fruit of your womb,
Poetic Translation: and blessed is the fruit born of your body:
Holy Saint Mary, Mother of God,
pray for your children, sinners that we are,

Lyrics: nunc, et in hora mortis nostrae.
Direct Translation: now, and in the hour of our death.
Poetic Translation: now and upon our final moments.

Lyrics: Catechism of the Council of Trent
